articles.title: Trump and Putin Meet in Alaska to Discuss Ukraine Conflict
articles.description: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin met in Anchorage, Alaska, to discuss the ongoing war in Ukraine. The meeting concluded without a concrete deal or ceasefire agreement.

articles.title: Florida Plans 'Deportation Depot' Amid Immigration Crackdown
articles.description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis announced plans to open a second immigration detention center, dubbed 'Deportation Depot,' as part of the state's intensified efforts to detain and deport undocumented immigrants.

articles.title: US Markets End Week on Mixed Note; Dow Flirts with Record as Fed Cut Bets Grow
articles.description: U.S. stock markets ended Friday's session on a mixed note, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average briefly hitting its first intraday record high of 2025, while the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite pulled back amid investor speculation on potential Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.
